description: This file contains an initialization script for the 'AAN_inicio Copy 2' screen of a Samsung TV Content Hub project. It sets up accessibility features for 'tv-play' buttons, including keyboard support and focus handling, and ensures initialization runs at appropriate times during page load.

methods.name: init()
methods.description: Initializes accessibility enhancements for the screen, such as making 'tv-play' buttons keyboard accessible and preventing multiple event listener attachments.
